submission:
class Solution:
    def minChanges(self, nums: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        
        n = len(nums)
        
        c1 = Counter()
        
        t = []
        
        for i in range(n//2):
            k1,k2 = nums[i], nums[n-1-i]
            tt = max([abs(k-k1),abs(k-k2), k1,k2])
            t.append(tt)
            c1[abs(k1-k2)]+=1
            
        t.sort()
        
        res = 10**15
        
        for k,v in c1.items():
            idx = bisect_left(t, k)
            # print(k,v,idx,n,t)
            res = min(res, n//2-v+idx)
        
        return res
